analyzed: dga' bo / de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang mig lam du snang ba ma yin te / chos la chos snang bar mi 'gyur ro // chos kyi chos mi mthong /

translated: Nanda, just as the TathƒÅgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One Ak·π£obhya, those ≈õrƒÅvakas, those individuals belonging to the Bodhisattva Vehicle, and that buddha-field are not visible to the eye, in the same way, all phenomena are not visible to the eye.

original: chos thams cad ni shes pa med pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni shes pa med pa /

analyzed: bya ba la mthu med pa sha stag ste /

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: dga' bo / chos thams cad ni nam mkha' ltar byed pa med pas byed pa med cing 'dzin pa med pa'o //

analyzed: dga' bo / chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu lta bu ste bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //

analyzed: dga' bo / chos thams cad ni sems dang bral zhing rnam par bsgrubs pas so sor gnas pa'i mtshan nyid de /

analyzed: snying po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med pa'o //

analyzed: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems @434b dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste /
translated: The bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattva who practices like this practices the perfection of wisdom.

original: chos gang la 'ang mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: chos gang la 'ang mngon par chags pa med do //

original: dga' bo / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ste /
analyzed: dga' bo / de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ste /
translated: Nanda, the bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattva who trains like this trains in the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: de ltar slob pa ni rab ces bya'o //
translated: Those who train in this way are called ‚Äúexcellent.‚Äù

analyzed: gtso bo zhes bya'o // mchog ces bya'o // dam pa zhes bya'o //

original: phul zhes bya'o //
analyzed: phul zhes bya'o //
translated: They are called ‚Äúsublime.‚ÄùüîΩThey are called ‚Äúbest.‚Äù

analyzed: gya nom pa zhes bya'o // bla na med pa zhes bya'o //

analyzed: gong na med pa zhes bya'o // mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o //
translated: They are called ‚Äúincomparable.‚ÄùüîΩThey are called ‚Äúunequaled.‚Äù

analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o //

original: 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa /

original: 'jig rten thams cad la bde ba /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad la bde ba /

analyzed: mgon med pa rnams la mgon du gyur pa /

original: sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba /

original: sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa ste /

original: de la gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di phyag g-yas pas gyen du bteg cing phyir gzhog kyang sems can de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
analyzed: de la gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di phyag g-yas pas gyen du bteg cing phyir gzhog kyang sems can de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
translated: While abiding in this, the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas can raise up and put down with their right hand this world system of a billion worlds, and yet the beings in it would not know whether they were moving or not.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bteg go zhes bya ba dang / bzhag go zhes bya bar mi shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bteg go zhes bya ba dang / bzhag go zhes bya bar mi shes pa'o //
translated: He does not know that the world is lifted up or put down.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dga' bo / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i sangs @435a *//
analyzed: dga' bo / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i sangs @435a *//
translated: Nanda, the past, future, and present

original: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de nyid la bslabs pas chos rnams la thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes gzigs pa bsgrub pa yin te /
analyzed: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de nyid la bslabs pas chos rnams la thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes gzigs pa bsgrub pa yin te /
translated: Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, have also attained the unobstructed knowledge and vision of all phenomena by training in just this perfection of wisdom.

original: dga' bo / bslab pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa'i bslab pa thams cad kyi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab pa ni rab ces bya'o //
analyzed: dga' bo / bslab pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa'i bslab pa thams cad kyi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab pa ni rab ces bya'o //
translated: Nanda, among all the trainings that exist, the training in the perfection of wisdom is called the best.

original: gtso bo zhes bya'o //üîΩmchog ces bya'o //üîΩdam pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gtso bo zhes bya'o // mchog ces bya'o // dam pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the foremost.üîΩIt is called the supreme.üîΩIt is called the excellent.

original: phul zhes bya'o //
analyzed: phul zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the sublime.

original: gya nom pa zhes bya'o //üîΩbla na med pa zhes bya'o //üîΩgong na med pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gya nom pa zhes bya'o // bla na med pa zhes bya'o // gong na med pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the refined.üîΩIt is called the unsurpassed.

original: mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the unequaled.üîΩIt is called the matchless.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the equal of the unequal.

original: dga' bo / gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad gzung ba'am /
analyzed: dga' bo / gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad gzung ba'am /
translated: Nanda, if someone wants to measure the perfection of wisdom,

original: mtha' btsal bar 'dod pa ni nam mkha' la tshad gzung ba dang / mtha' btsal par 'dod du zad do //
analyzed: mtha' btsal bar 'dod pa ni nam mkha' la tshad gzung ba dang / mtha' btsal par 'dod du zad do //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na; dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad med pa ste /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na; dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad med pa ste /
translated: Why is that? Nanda, the perfection of wisdom is immeasurable.

original: dga' bo / ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshad du bstan pa med do //
analyzed: dga' bo / ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshad du bstan pa med do //
translated: Nanda, I have not taught the perfection of wisdom to have limits.

original: ming mang po dang / tshig mang po dang / 'bru mang po la ni tshad yod kyi /
analyzed: ming mang po dang / tshig mang po dang / 'bru mang po la ni tshad yod kyi /
translated: Many names, many phrases, and many syllables have limits,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni tshad med do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni tshad med do //
translated: but the perfection of wisdom is limitless.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, ‚ÄúBhagavƒÅn,

original: ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshad ma mchis pa lags /
analyzed: ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshad ma mchis pa lags /
translated: why is the perfection of wisdom limitless?‚ÄùüîΩThe BhagavƒÅn said,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: ‚ÄúNanda,

original: dga' bo / mi zad pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshad med do //
analyzed: dga' bo / mi zad pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshad med do //
translated: Ananda, the perfection of wisdom is immeasurable because it is inexhaustible.

original: dga' bo / dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu @435b phyin pa la tshad med do //
analyzed: dga' bo / dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu @435b phyin pa la tshad med do //
translated: Ananda, the perfection of wisdom is immeasurable because it is isolated.

original: dga' bo / 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las byung ste /
analyzed: dga' bo / 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las byung ste /
translated: Ananda, all the Tathagatas, Arhats, Perfectly Awakened Ones of the past have come forth from this very perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par ma gyur to //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par ma gyur to //
translated: The perfection of wisdom has not been exhausted.

original: dga' bo / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las byung ste /
analyzed: dga' bo / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las byung ste /
translated: Ananda, all the Tathagatas, Arhats, Perfectly Awakened Ones of the future will come forth from this very perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom will not be exhausted.

original: dga' bo / da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las byung ste /
analyzed: dga' bo / da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las byung ste /
translated: Ananda, all the Tathagatas, Arhats, Perfectly Awakened Ones, who are now in the world in the ten directions, those Blessed Buddhas who are living, remaining in the world for the sake of those who are to be trained, and teaching the Dharma, they all have come forth from this very perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zad do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zad do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom has not been exhausted.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: dga' bo / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' zad par bya bar sems su zad de /
analyzed: dga' bo / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' zad par bya bar sems su zad de /
translated: Ananda, he who would think of exhausting the perfection of wisdom, he would think of exhausting space.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The perfection of wisdom has not been exhausted, is not exhausted, will not be exhausted.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The perfection of concentration has not been exhausted, is not exhausted, will not be exhausted.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The perfection of energy has not been exhausted, is not exhausted, will not be exhausted.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩtshul khrims kyi @436a *//
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro // tshul khrims kyi @436a *//
translated: The perfection of patience is not exhausted, is not exhausted now, and will not be exhausted.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The perfection of morality is not exhausted, is not exhausted now, and will not be exhausted.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //

original: nang stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Inner emptiness is not exhausted, is not exhausted now, and will not be exhausted.

original: phyi stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Inner and outer emptiness is not exhausted, is not exhausted now, and will not be exhausted.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is not exhausted, is not exhausted now, and will not be exhausted.

original: chen po stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The emptiness of ultimate reality is not exhausted, is not exhausted now, and will not be exhausted.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: tshad med pa rnams ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro //

original: bdag med pa'am /üîΩzhi ba 'am /
analyzed: bdag med pa'am / zhi ba 'am /
translated: He does not see the emptiness of emptiness as having an end or not having an end,üîΩnor does he see the emptiness of emptiness as being calm or not being calm.üîΩHe does not see the emptiness of great extent as having an end or not having an end,üîΩnor does he see the emptiness of great extent as being calm or not being calm.üîΩHe does not see the emptiness of ultimate reality as having an end or not having an end,üîΩnor does he see the emptiness of ultimate reality as being calm or not being calm.üîΩHe does not see the emptiness of the compounded as having an end or not having an end,üîΩnor does he see the emptiness of the compounded as being calm or not being calm.üîΩHe does not see the emptiness of the uncompounded as having an end or not having an end,

original: ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo ////üîΩshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //üîΩbam po nyis brgya nga gsum pa /üîΩde ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩrab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa // bam po nyis brgya nga gsum pa / de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: nor does he see the emptiness of the uncompounded as being calm or not being calm.üîΩHe does not see the emptiness of what is beyond extremes as having an end or not having an end,üîΩnor does he see the emptiness of what is beyond extremes as being calm or not being calm.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: He does not see the emptiness of no beginning and no end as having an end or not having an end,üîΩnor does he see the emptiness of no beginning and no end as being calm or not being calm.üîΩHe does not see the emptiness of nature

original: chos gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see that dharma by which he might see the perfection of wisdom.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /

original: chos gang gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /

analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /

analyzed: chos gang gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /

original: chos gang gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /

analyzed: nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /

analyzed: chos gang gis nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /

original: chos gang gis chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos gang gis chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /

analyzed: chos gang gis don dam pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /

analyzed: chos gang gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /

original: chos gang gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos gang gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: chos gang gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos gang gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see that dharma by which they would see the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of no beginning and no end.

original: chos gang gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar @463a *//
analyzed: chos gang gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar @463a *//

original: 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see that dharma by which they would see the emptiness of no beginning and no end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: chos gang gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos gang gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see that dharma by which they would see the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos gang gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos gang gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see that dharma by which they would see the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: They do not see the emptiness of all things.

original: chos gang gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos gang gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: That dharma by which one sees the emptiness of all dharmas is also not seen.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: One does not see the emptiness of its own mark.

original: chos gang gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos gang gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: That dharma by which one sees the emptiness of its own mark is also not seen.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: One does not see the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: chos gang gis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos gang gis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: That dharma by which one sees the emptiness of non-apprehension is also not seen.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: One does not see the emptiness of non-things.

original: chos gang gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par @463b rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos gang gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang yang dag par @463b rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: That phenomenon by which one sees the emptiness of non-things is also not seen.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /

analyzed: dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //

analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //

original: byams pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: byams pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //

analyzed: snying rje la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so // dga' ba la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo'o //

original: de'ang ci nas kyang de'i tshe /
analyzed: de'ang ci nas kyang de'i tshe /
translated: And he dedicates them in such a way that at that time

analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to; ;gsol pa /
translated: ‚ÄúSubh≈´ti, in that way bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of patience incorporate the perfection of concentration.‚ÄùüîΩ‚ÄúLord, how do bodhisattva great beings standing in the perfection of patience incorporate the perfection of wisdom?‚Äù

analyzed: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /

analyzed: dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //

translated: He dwells in the immeasurable compassion of the bodhisattvas,üîΩand he enters and dwells in the immeasurable compassion of the bodhisattvas.üîΩHe dwells in the immeasurable joy of the bodhisattvas,üîΩand he enters and dwells in the immeasurable joy of the bodhisattvas.

analyzed: snying rje tshad med pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //

analyzed: de sems can rnams la dga' ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas / dga' ba tshad med pa la nye bar @479b bsgrubs te gnas so //

translated: He abides in immeasurable equanimity, having brought to mind the perception of the absence of suffering and joy toward sentient beings.

original: de gzugs la che long du 'du shes shing nam mkha' la zhi bar 'du shes pa yid la byed pas /üîΩnam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //üîΩde nam mkha' la che long du 'du shes shing rnam par shes pa la zhi bar 'du shes pa yid la byed pas /

translated: He abides in the sphere of infinite space, having brought to mind the perception of the vastness of space and the peacefulness of space.üîΩHe abides in the sphere of infinite consciousness, having brought to mind the perception of the vastness of consciousness and the peacefulness of consciousness.

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He abides in the sphere of nothing-at-all, having brought to mind the perception of the vastness of nothing-at-all and the peacefulness of nothing-at-all.üîΩHe abides in the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception, having brought to mind the perception of the vastness of neither perception nor non-perception and the peacefulness of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: de rnam par shes pa la che long du 'du shes shing cung zad med pa la zhi bar 'du shes pa yid la byed pas /
analyzed: de rnam par shes pa la che long du 'du shes shing cung zad med pa la zhi bar 'du shes pa yid la byed pas /
translated: They focus their attention on the sphere of infinite consciousness as being expansive and on the sphere of nothingness as being peaceful.

original: cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: They establish and maintain the meditative absorption of the sphere of nothingness.

original: de cung zad med pa la che long du 'du shes shing 'du shes med 'du shes med min la zhi bar 'du shes par yid la byed pas /
analyzed: de cung zad med pa la che long du 'du shes shing 'du shes med 'du shes med min la zhi bar 'du shes par yid la byed pas /
translated: They focus their attention on the sphere of nothingness as being expansive and on the sphere of neither perception nor nonperception as being peaceful.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: They establish and maintain the meditative absorption of the sphere of neither perception nor nonperception.
